name: 陳志遠
objective:
本課程主題將集中於材料、光電技術與該些技術之關鍵專利檢索、布局策略研討，學生除了可學習材料科學與光電科技的基礎知識外，亦可瞭解到專利如何運用在這些相關產業上，課程內容包括: (1)材料科學原理，(2)材料科技產業介紹，(3)材料產業關鍵專利檢索與布局分析、(4)光電工程技術、(5)光電科技產業分析、(6)光電產業關鍵專利檢索與布局分析。
============================================================
The objective of this course will focus on materials science principle, electro-optical technology and their related essential patents portfolio analysis. The content of the course includes: (1) material science principle, (2) material technology industry analysis, (3) material technology essential patents, (4) electro-optical technology, (5) electro-optical industry analysis, (6) electro-optical industry essential patents.
schedule:
單元1: 課程簡介,課程規則
單元2: 專利檢索與各國資料庫查詢介紹
單元3: 材料產業簡介； 專利起源- 各國發展與專利制度
單元4: 材料產業簡介；產業專利申請程序
單元5: 材料產業簡介；專利權實施與專利侵權
單元6: 光電產業簡介；高科技產業專利申請策略 
單元7: 光電產業簡介；專利國際佈局策略
單元8: 業師實務案例分享
單元9: 期末報告
============================================================
Unit 1:  Syllabus introduction
Unit 2:  Material industry introduction and Patent search system and patent database introduction
Unit 3:  Materials Industry introduction and The Patent history and patent prosecution system
Unit 4:  Materials Industry introduction and Patent Prosecution process
Unit 5: Opto-Electro industry introduction and Patent portfolio strategy
Unit 6:  Opto-Electro Industry introduction and Patent Infringement introuction
Unit 7:  Opto-Electro Industry introduction and International Patent filing strategy
Unit 8:  Case study 
Unit 9:  Final report
